reviewText: Since some of my VHS copies are getting choppy, I haven't seen some of these girls look so good in a long time.  Many of my favorite playmates are on this collection & it's nice to be able to use the skip function to just play the ones I like & skip the rest.  It makes the collection even better than I remembered.Plenty to like here!
Title: N/A

reviewText: If you ever bought a Playmate Video Calendar DVD, this is a must-have since you can avoid buying them all individually, by getting this collection. That's just what this collection is, just two Calendars reproduced on one disc, so you have 5 discs for the 10 years in the decade. A bonus disc collects 3 final years of the '80s. The early years don't have the songs or music for each Playmate that we are so fimilar with with the current editions. If you already collected the Video Calendars when they came out, this collections doesn't serve much use. But if you are missing some years, then you can consider buying this, since it's a great value for under 20 dollars.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Playboy: Playmate DVD Calendar Collection - The 90's is ten hours and thirty-one and was released on DVD on November 16, 2004. It is not the twelve plus hours it claims to be. Only three years, 1987, 1988, and 1990 are over one hour. The other ten years average around 55 minutes. Seven of the Playmates are featured in two Playboy Calendars; with the exception of Sherry Arnett, the other six are Playboy Playmates of the Year. Below is a list of the Playmates that are featured in two Playboy Video Calendars. In my opinion 1991 and 1998 were the only two conservative years where the Playmates were barely nude. The years 1987 through 1989 were the prototype\experimental years. In the first three years of the video Playmate calendars, it is mostly interview and not much nudity in the second half. Still this still takes you down memory lane of the Playmates that you forgot of years gone by. Also I included in the years, 1989, 1990, and 1997 a list of Playmates featured in that video. Playboy: Playmate DVD Calendar Collection - The 90's is a great set to own. Playboy: Playmate DVD Calendar Collection - The 90's gets an A-.Sherry Arnett 1987 & 1988Kimberly Conrad 1989 & 1990Lisa Matthews 1991 & 1992Anna Nicole Smith 1993 (as Vicki Smith in 1993) & 1994Julie Lynn Cialini 1995 & 1996Stacy Sanches 1996 & 1997Heather Kozar 1999 & 2000DVD FEATURESDisc 1 (Bonus Disc)1987-1989 (two hours and fifty-three minutes)1987 Video Playmate Calendar - reviewText: Well what can you say, with this you can the best and worst of the 90's. As far as nude females are concerned. You get to see the early 90's with big hair in multiple places. And finally you get to the mid to late 90's my favorite period for Playmates. Pretty much all of my favorites were in there, Stacy Sanches, Victoria Silvstedt, Karen McDougal, and several others. If you can stomach the price then you'll realize that for what you pay for each of the years seperately you are getting one heck of a bargain. Granted I don't watch the first 2-3 years just because I don't find the Playmates of that period to be very attractive. Apart from that the movies are the same just thrown together so you get a couple of years on each disc. By the way, good luck being able to sit through 12 hours of this!
